statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({8.34}+{7.83}\right)}={32.34}\approx{32.34}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{7.83}\cdot{8.31}={65.0673}\approx{65.1}.
